暠字的基本解释

暠
hào
同“皓”。

暠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gǎo］
［《廣韻》古老切，上晧，見。］
光明；明亮。参见“暠暠”。
[②]［hào］
［《集韻》下老切，上晧，匣。］
白；洁白。

暠字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　暠； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页498第43
【廣韻】【集韻】【正韻】?古老切，音藁。明白貌。　又【集韻】【韻會】?下老切，音晧。與皓同。【玉篇】白也。【前漢·司馬相如傳】暠然白首。

暠字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
暠字的起名意思

同“皓”，光明，明亮的样子。

Hao
Basic explanation of words
Hao
hào
Same as "hao".
Hao
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gǎo］
["Guangyun" ancient cut, Shanghao, see you. ]
Bright; bright. See "Hao Hao".
[②]［hào］
["Ji Yun" Xia Laoqie, Shang Hao, Xie. ]
White; white.
Hao
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji 1] [Japanese Character Department] 　 Hao; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 498 to 43
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Ancient cut, sound 藁. Understand the appearance.　[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Club]? Next old cut, Yinhao. Same as Hao. [Jade articles] White also. [Previous Han·Sima Xiangru Biography] Hao Ran has a white head.
